input.name: name
input.placeholder: Use a catchy name that is accurate to your idea.

textarea.name: description
textarea.placeholder: Aim of the project, why you want to create it, for which purpose and any useful information that the donors should know.

div.small: Indicate when your project should end.
Upload a cover photo that represents your project. Best size: 900x400px

input.name: presentation_video
input.placeholder: Paste any video link that showcase your project (e.g. https://vimeo.com/jlkj34ek5)

div.small: Paste any video link that showcase your project (e.g. https://vimeo.com/jlkj34ek5)
Choose if you are doing your project alone, or if you want to open it to other fundraisers (ie: collective sport projects)

div.p: If there is any social media pages for your event, you can link them on the project page.
If you want to propose people to sponsor a child, please indicate the goal number in the box below.
If you want to propose people to sponsor a mum and her baby, please indicate the goal number in the box below.

Indicate the amount in the above box. 1
is equivalent to CHF .-

Indicate the amount in the above box. 1
is equivalent to CHF .-

span.t-att-data-values: { 'partner_email': not public and partner.email or '', 'partner_firstname': not public and partner.firstname or '', 'partner_lastname': not public and partner.lastname or '', 'partner_street': not public and partner.street or '', 'partner_zip': not public and partner.zip or '', 'partner_city': not public and partner.city or '', 'partner_phone': not public and partner.phone or '', 'phone': not public and partner.phone or '', }

div.style: position: relative !important; height: 0px !important; width: 0px !important; float: left !important;

div.small: This name will be display instead of your name.
Upload a profile picture, square 800 x 800px

section.class: s_text_block pt64 pb64 o_colored_level o_cc o_cc2

div.h2: Thank you for launching joining a project !
div.p: You will receive an email with all the necessary information.
